languages.text: "Судно не было потеряно — его украли. Если бы не существовало возможностей преступить закон, то не было бы и Адептус Арбитес. В Каликсисе наши силы уже бы настигли еретика и предали его каре, но здесь арбитры не обладают такими ресурсами".

"The ship was not lost — it was stolen. If breaking the law were an impossibility, there would be no Adeptus Arbites. In the Calixis Sector, our forces would have caught up with that heretic by now and brought him to justice, but the Arbitrators here do not have such resources."
languages.original_text: "Судно не было потеряно — его украли. Если бы не существовало возможностей преступить закон, то не было бы и Адептус Арбитес. В Каликсисе наши силы уже бы настигли еретика и предали его каре, но здесь арбитры не обладают такими ресурсами".

traits.locale_text: "The ship was not lost — it was stolen. If breaking the law were an impossibility, there would be no Adeptus Arbites. In the Calixis Sector, our fleet would have caught up with that heretic by now and brought him to justice, but the Arbitrators here do not have such resources."

"The ship was not lost — it was stolen. If breaking the law were an impossibility, there would be no Adeptus Arbites. In the Calixis Sector, our fleet would have caught up with that heretic by now and brought him to justice, but the Arbitrators here do not have such resources."

"The ship was not lost — it was stolen. If breaking the law were an impossibility, there would be no Adeptus Arbites. In the Calixis Sector, our fleet would have caught up with that heretic by now and brought him to justice, but the Arbitrators here do not have such resources."

"The ship was not lost — it was stolen. If breaking the law were an impossibility, there would be no Adeptus Arbites. In the Calixis Sector, our forces would have caught up with that heretic by now and brought him to justice, but the Arbitrators here do not have such resources."

"The ship was not lost — it was stolen. If breaking the law were an impossibility, there would be no Adeptus Arbites. In the Calixis Sector, our forces would have caught up with that heretic by now and brought him to justice, but the Arbitrators here do not have such resources."

languages.text: «La nave no se perdió, la robaron. Si fuera imposible quebrantar la ley, no existiría el Adeptus Arbites. En el sector Calixis Sector, nuestras fuerzas ya habría alcanzado a ese hereje para ajusticiarlo, pero, aquí, los Arbitrator no cuentan con esos recursos».
languages.original_text: "The ship was not lost — it was stolen. If breaking the law were an impossibility, there would be no Adeptus Arbites. In the Calixis Sector, our forces would have caught up with that heretic by now and brought him to justice, but the Arbitrators here do not have such resources."

traits.locale_text: «La nave no se perdió, la robaron. Si fuera imposible quebrantar la ley, no existiría el Adeptus Arbites. En el sector Calixis Sector, nuestras fuerzas ya habría alcanzado a ese hereje para ajusticiarlo, pero, aquí, los Arbitrator no cuentan con esos recursos».

languages.text: “那艘船并不是弄丢了，而是被夺走了。如果法律的力量牢不可破，那帝国也就不需要什么法务部了。如果这种事情发生在卡利西斯星区，我们的队伍恐怕早就抓住了那个异端分子，将他绳之以法，但在这里，法务官没有那么充足的资源。”
languages.original_text: "The ship was not lost — it was stolen. If breaking the law were an impossibility, there would be no Adeptus Arbites. In the Calixis Sector, our forces would have caught up with that heretic by now and brought him to justice, but the Arbitrators here do not have such resources."

traits.locale_text: “那艘船并不是弄丢了，而是被夺走了。如果法律的力量牢不可破，那帝国也就不需要什么法务部了。如果这种事情发生在卡利西斯星区，我们的队伍恐怕早就抓住了那个异端分子，将他绳之以法，但在这里，法务官没有那么充足的资源。”

languages.text: « Le vaisseau n'a pas été perdu, il a été volé. S'il était impossible d'enfreindre la loi, l'Adeptus Arbites n'aurait pas lieu d'être. Au sein du secteur Calixis, nos armées auraient eu tôt fait de rattraper cet hérétique et de le traduire en justice, mais les arbitrators ne disposent pas de telles ressources dans la région. »
languages.original_text: "The ship was not lost — it was stolen. If breaking the law were an impossibility, there would be no Adeptus Arbites. In the Calixis Sector, our forces would have caught up with that heretic by now and brought him to justice, but the Arbitrators here do not have such resources."

traits.locale_text: « Le vaisseau n'a pas été perdu, il a été volé. S'il était impossible d'enfreindre la loi, l'Adeptus Arbites n'aurait pas lieu d'être. Au sein du secteur Calixis, nos armées auraient eu tôt fait de rattraper cet hérétique et de le traduire en justice, mais les arbitrators ne disposent pas de telles ressources dans la région. »

languages.text: 「船は失われたのではなく、盗まれたのです。法を犯すことが不可能ならば、アデプトゥス・アルビテスは存在しなかったでしょう。キャリクシス星域では、今頃私たちはあの異端者に追いついていて、彼に法の裁きを与えていただろうが、ここではアルビテスにそんなリソースはありません」
languages.original_text: "The ship was not lost — it was stolen. If breaking the law were an impossibility, there would be no Adeptus Arbites. In the Calixis Sector, our forces would have caught up with that heretic by now and brought him to justice, but the Arbitrators here do not have such resources."

traits.locale_text: 「船は失われたのではなく、盗まれたのです。法を犯すことが不可能ならば、アデプトゥス・アルビテスは存在しなかったでしょう。キャリクシス星域では、今頃私たちの艦隊はあの異端者に追いついていて、彼に法の裁きを与えていただろうが、ここではアルビテスにそんなリソースはありません」

languages.text: "Gemi kaybetmedik. Gemimiz çalındı. Arada sırada yasalar çiğnenmese Adeptus Arbites var olmazdı. Calixis Sektörü'nde olsak kuvvetlerimiz o kâfiri çoktan yakalar ve adalete teslim ederdi, ne yazık ki buradaki Yargıcıların öyle kaynakları yok."
languages.original_text: "The ship was not lost — it was stolen. If breaking the law were an impossibility, there would be no Adeptus Arbites. In the Calixis Sector, our forces would have caught up with that heretic by now and brought him to justice, but the Arbitrators here do not have such resources."

traits.locale_text: "Gemi kaybetmedik. Gemimiz çalındı. Arada sırada yasalar çiğnenmese Adeptus Arbites var olmazdı. Calixis Sektörü'nde olsak kuvvetlerimiz o kâfiri çoktan yakalar ve adalete teslim ederdi, ne yazık ki buradaki Yargıcıların öyle kaynakları yok."

languages.text: "Wir haben das Schiff nicht verloren ... es wurde gestohlen. Wären Gesetzesverstöße nicht möglich, gäbe es keine Adeptus Arbites. Im Calixis-Sektor hätten unsere Truppen den Ketzer längst gestellt und zur Rechenschaft gezogen, aber hier verfügen die Arbitratoren nicht über die entsprechenden Ressourcen."
languages.original_text: "The ship was not lost — it was stolen. If breaking the law were an impossibility, there would be no Adeptus Arbites. In the Calixis Sector, our forces would have caught up with that heretic by now and brought him to justice, but the Arbitrators here do not have such resources."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben das Schiff nicht verloren ... es wurde gestohlen. Wären Gesetzesverstöße nicht möglich, gäbe es keine Adeptus Arbites. Im Calixis-Sektor hätten unsere Truppen den Ketzer längst gestellt und zur Rechenschaft gezogen, aber hier verfügen die Arbitratoren nicht über die entsprechenden Ressourcen."

languages.original_text: "The ship was not lost — it was stolen. If breaking the law were an impossibility, there would be no Adeptus Arbites. In the Calixis Sector, our forces would have caught up with that heretic by now and brought him to justice, but the Arbitrators here do not have such resources."
